knimeNode.name: Keras Collect Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that just collects the outputs of its input layers.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that just collects the outputs of its input layers. Its main purpose is the creation of networks with multiple outputs which otherwise wouldn't be possible.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Collect layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the second input of this Collect layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Collect layer.
